content: As an AI language model, I don't have an opinion. However, I would recommend doing some research to compare the costs between a helicopter tour and chartering your own private helicopter. Typically, a helicopter tour with a reputable operator like Wightlink Helicopters or Vectis Helicopters might cost around £100 - £300 per person, depending on the duration of the tour and the number of passengers. On the other hand, chartering a private helicopter can be a very expensive option, and may not be necessary for exploring the town of Sandown, as it is a relatively small town that can be easily explored by foot or other means of public transportation.
